channel.title: Spirit shield colouring
channel.description: basically i want to get spirit shields the correct colours. On my old 317 the spirit shield colours were perfect however on the current [PI] i have now the colours for some like arcane for example are grey. I tried to bring the model over from my 317 but that just gave me an old 317 spirit shield which was still grey. any ideasss
